title: User Authentication via Credentials
description: Verify users can successfully sign up, log in, and log out using email and password credentials, ensuring session is created and maintained securely.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Input valid email and password and submit the signup form
Check that user account is created and confirmation message or redirect is presented
Navigate to the login page
Input the same valid email and password and submit the login form
Verify login is successful, session is established, and user dashboard is accessible
Perform logout action
Verify session is terminated and user is redirected to public homepage

title: User Authentication via OAuth Providers
description: Validate login and signup flows using GitHub and Google OAuth providers with secure session handling.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click 'Login with GitHub' button and complete OAuth consent flow
Verify user is logged in and redirected to dashboard
Logout user
Repeat the login process using 'Login with Google' button
Verify successful login and session creation

title: Authentication Failure Handling
description: Ensure correct error messages and security measures are in place when login fails due to invalid credentials or canceled OAuth flows.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input incorrect email/password combination and submit
Verify error message is shown and user is not logged in
Initiate GitHub OAuth login and cancel consent
Verify appropriate error or cancellation message is displayed

title: Digital Product Search and Filtering
description: Verify marketplace supports keyword search, category filters, and advanced filtering options with accurate results and no performance lag.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace page
Enter a product keyword in search bar and submit
Check that displayed products are relevant to the query
Select a category and apply filters such as price range and rating
Verify filtered results match selected criteria
Clear filters and validate all products are shown again

title: Product Details Display and File Download
description: Ensure product detail pages render correctly with all details, tutorials, and allow buyers to download purchased digital content.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page from marketplace
Verify product images, description, pricing, tutorials, and seller info are displayed
Login as a buyer who purchased the product
Access the download link or button
Verify digital files download successfully and are accessible only to authorized users

title: Seller Product Management Wizard
description: Test the multi-step product registration process for sellers including input validations and file uploads while persisting data correctly.

steps.description: Login as a seller
Navigate to product registration wizard
Fill in basic info (name, category, thumbnail)
Verify thumbnail upload via Cloudinary works and size/format constraints are enforced
Proceed to detailed description step and input markdown content
Set pricing, upload product files, and tutorials
Submit product for creation
Verify product is created in database and visible in seller's products list

title: Bootpay Payment Flow Success
description: Validate successful Bootpay payment flows across all supported payment methods, confirm purchase and update database and UI accordingly.

steps.description: Login as a buyer
Add product to cart and initiate payment
Complete payment using each Bootpay supported method (cards, KakaoPay, NaverPay, TossPay, mobile, bank transfer, virtual account) in separate tests
Verify payment success response, purchase records update, and download access granted

title: Bootpay Payment Failure and Cancellation Handling
description: Verify system handles payment failures, cancellations, and refunds properly with correct UI feedback, database consistency, and webhook processing.

steps.description: Initiate a Bootpay payment and simulate failure or cancellation
Confirm failure or cancellation message displayed and no purchase record created
Test refund processing through webhook or admin panel
Verify refund records update, user is notified, and funds are returned

title: Wishlist Functionality and Restrictions
description: Check buyer can add/remove products from wishlist, wishlist persists across sessions, and unauthorized attempts are blocked.

steps.description: Login as a buyer
Add multiple products to wishlist from marketplace
Verify wishlist UI updates accordingly and products are saved in database
Logout and log back in
Verify wishlist contents persist
Attempt to add or remove wishlist item while not logged in
Verify action is blocked and appropriate error shown

title: Community Post CRUD Operations with Comments and Reactions
description: Validate users can create, edit, delete posts and add comments, replies, reactions, with role-based restrictions and data consistency.

steps.description: Login as a community user
Create a new post with title and content
Verify post appears on community page and is retrievable
Edit the post content and save
Confirm updated content is displayed
Add comments and replies to the post
Confirm comments and replies render correctly
React to post (like, etc.)
Verify reaction count updates and is user-specific
Delete the post
Confirm post and associated data are removed

title: Role-Based Access Control
description: Ensure visitors, buyers, sellers, and administrators can only access authorized UI pages and API endpoints; unauthorized access is denied.

steps.description: Try accessing seller dashboard pages as visitor and buyer
Verify access denied or redirected to login
Try accessing admin panel pages as buyer and seller
Verify access denied
Check API endpoints with unauthorized tokens and without tokens for sensitive operations
Verify proper HTTP 401/403 responses

title: Multi-language and UI Responsiveness
description: Verify Korean and English locales load correctly, content keys are used, and UI resizes and reflows properly on mobile, tablet, desktop, and large screens.

steps.description: Switch language locale to Korean and English
Verify translated text appears on all key pages and locale persists across navigation
Resize browser to different screen sizes: mobile, tablet, desktop, large
Verify UI elements resize, reposition, and remain accessible and usable

title: Cloudinary Image Upload Constraints
description: Test image uploads obey maximum size and accepted formats with proper error messages and successful URL returns for valid uploads.

steps.description: Upload various image files via Cloudinary API endpoint with valid sizes and formats
Confirm successful upload with correct Cloudinary URL returned
Attempt to upload an image exceeding size limits or unsupported format
Verify error response and client displays appropriate message

title: Notifications and Push Subscription
description: Validate notification settings can be updated by user, push subscription is supported and notifications are received accordingly.

steps.description: Login as user and navigate to notification settings
Update notification preferences and save
Confirm settings updated in database and UI confirmation shown
Subscribe to push notifications
Verify push subscription confirmation and receiving of test notifications

title: Admin Panel User and Product Management
description: Test admin can view, search, edit, approve, or delete users and products, trigger exports, and monitor analytics with UI updates and database consistency.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Access admin dashboard user and product sections
Search for users and products by various criteria
Verify search results are accurate and paginated
Approve or reject product submissions
Confirm product status changes and notifications sent
Edit user roles and revoke or grant access
Verify user permissions updated successfully
Export user or product data and check exported file
Confirm export success and correct formatting

title: AI-Powered Personalized Recommendations
description: Check recommended products and content feed update dynamically per user activity and that API returns relevant items.

steps.description: Login as user and browse various product categories
Observe personalized recommendation sections on marketplace and dashboard
Verify recommendations reflect user interests and previously viewed/purchased items
Call recommendations API with user token
Confirm API returns relevant recommendations in proper JSON format

title: Bundle and Coupon Management
description: Verify sellers and admins can create, edit, validate, and apply bundles and coupons correctly affecting pricing and purchases.

steps.description: Login as seller
Create a product bundle and attach valid coupons
Verify bundle and coupon creation success with valid constraints
Attempt to apply invalid or expired coupon during purchase
Verify coupon validation API rejects and UI shows error
Apply valid coupon and complete purchase
Confirm discounted price applied and purchase records correct

title: FAQ Filtering and Search
description: Ensure FAQ page loads all categories, supports accordion UI for answers, and filtering/search returns accurate results.

steps.description: Navigate to FAQ page
Verify all FAQ categories are visible with expanded/collapsed answers
Use search bar to query FAQs
Confirm search results contain relevant questions and answers
Apply category filters
Verify FAQ list updates to selected category

title: API Health Check Endpoint
description: Validate health endpoint returns correct status code and response indicating system health and uptime.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/health
Verify HTTP 200 response with JSON body including status and uptime

title: Error Handling for Invalid API Requests
description: Test API endpoints respond with appropriate HTTP codes and error messages when invalid data or unauthorized access occurs.

steps.description: Send requests to marketplace, payments, admin, and seller APIs with invalid parameters or missing fields
All respond with meaningful errors (400, 401, 403, 404) in JSON format
Attempt accessing secured endpoints without authentication
Verify 401 Unauthorized responses
